items.description: Makes the launcher start in fullscreen. Does not affect the game itself. Can be toggled via the "Alt + Enter" key combo.
items.name: Fullscreen

items.description: Default width of the launcher window in pixels.
items.name: Default Window Width

items.description: Default height of the launcher window in pixels.
items.name: Default Window Height

items.description: Mutes the launcher sounds. Can be toggled via the "Alt + S" key combo.
items.name: Mute Sounds

items.description: Mutes the launcher music. Can be toggled via the "Alt + M" key combo.
items.name: Mute Music

items.description: Makes the game boot automatically after opening the launcher. You can press the <Backspace> key or the (Select) button in the disclaimer screen to go to the launcher menu.
items.name: Quick Launch

items.description: Closes the launcher after launching the game.
items.name: Close on Launch
